mudServer
Class Room

java.lang.Object
  mudServer.Room

public class Room
extends java.lang.Object

Each room holds players, mobiles, items, and paths to other rooms. The room sends messages to all players in it, and move players into and out of itself.

Author:
Nemesis

exclusiveSend

public void exclusiveSend(java.lang.String message,
                          Player thisPlayer)
Sends a message to everyone in the room except thisPlayer. This is an exclusive message sender.

Parameters:
message - The message to be sent.
thisPlayer - The player that will be excluded.
